page.description: Defines if the repeating section should have an 'Delete Row' button.
page.discussion: Specify if the repeating section has a button to delete rows from the repeating section. If this option is checked, the following properties are exposed:

item.name: ['Delete Row' icon]
item.description: The icon shown for the 'Delete Row' button.

item.name: ['Delete Row' bubble help]
item.description: The bubble help shown for the 'Delete Row' button.
